entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
